title: 设置死亡不掉落都有什么方法？
author: cuibingwei
txt_content: 在服务器里设置死亡不掉落都有什么方法？越多越好

replies.txt_content: 后台打指令.在控制台中输入“gamerule keepInventory true”            执行成功后会提示“CONSOLE: Game rule keepInventory has been set to: true”
后台打指令.在控制台中输入“gamerule keepInventory true”            执行成功后会提示“CONSOLE: Game rule keepInventory has been set to: true”

replies.author: lovechina
